description: Kerkira (Corfu in Greek) owes its existence to the chef’s Greek mother, who passed on the culinary traditions of her native island to her son. These traditions are alive and well in this taverna, which also features Calabrese and Mediterranean dishes on the menu. Simple dining room with a friendly ambience, not far from the centre and seafront in the village where singer Mia Martini was born.
